# The iconv extension

This extension provides support for interface to iconv character set conversion
facility.

## Configuration options

### PHP_EXT_ICONV

* Default: `ON`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Enables the extension.

### PHP_EXT_ICONV_SHARED

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Builds extension as shared.
